OOC: My head hurts.  Loony is not to be confused with Moony although a Moony 
is typically considered a religious nut.

::Aerotaur::
    As he stands watching this he thinks to himself *Oh good we got another 
loony on our hands.  And a religious loony at that.*  "Perplex.  Take a break 
inside.  The last thing we need right now is for you to go insane too."  He 
looks at the exposed energon.  It wasn't a large amount.  "Windlord, Perplex, 
clear out."  He flew upward and fired one shot at the energon detonating it.  
The ensuing explosion wasn't enough to kill anything that wasn't right on top 
of it, but it would do some minor damage to the base.
